group_1.textRight: ...@[wait:0.8][chara:104001:lipSynch_1]And this is...?

group_1.textLeft: The shop an' home of a travelling Coordinator.

group_1.textRight: The hell is that?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, before I take you on as an apprentice,@lemme introduce myself.

group_1.textRight: Apprentice...?@Oi, what are you...

group_1.textLeft: I'm Livia Medeiros. I've been travellin'@'round the country as a Coordinator.

group_1.textRight: I'm asking you...!

group_1.textLeft: Cool it. If ya wanna talk about adjustments and@apprenticeship, I'll explain it now.
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]'Scuse me for a sec.
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]Right here, see?

group_1.textRight: Ahâ€”?!@What...did you do to my Soul Gem...?

group_1.textLeft: That was a test run.@Just a simple adjustment.
...Whatcha think?@Feels a little different than before, don't it?

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:104001:cheek_0][chara:104001:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json][chara:104001:lipSynch_1]I've gotten...stronger?@Is this what an adjustment does...?

group_1.textLeft: Now, c'mon, say "thank you" like ya mean it.

group_1.textRight: ...Thank...you very...much.

group_1.textLeft: Eh, ya got the words out, but your heart's@not in 'em.
Well, 's good enough.@You get the idea now, right?
I can use magic to fiddle with other people's@Soul Gems.
I can do all kindsa things, like amplifyin'@your magic power.

group_1.textRight: I see. So the power of this adjustment will make me@tough enough to fight Witches...

group_1.textLeft: Nah, sorry, I'm afraid that's no dice.@Ya just too weak.
This was only a li'l tune-up to make you@a bit stronger.
Ya won't be able to fight as well as other girls.
Them's the breaks, but that's why I'm invitin' you@to be my apprentice.
It'd be for your own good, too.
I'm a Coordinator who runs a business of adjustin'@other Magical Girls.
In exchange for my service, they pay me with@Grief Seeds.

group_1.textRight: Then you're telling me you can't fight Witches@on your own, either?

group_1.textLeft: Nah.
That's why I'm earnin' my Seeds by lendin' a hand@to the ones who can fight.

group_1.textRight: ...Hmph. What bullshit.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: You just laughed me off for being weak.
And yet you can't even beat Witches yourself?@So you give up and turn tail...
Doesn't that make you more pathetic than me?

group_1.textLeft: I might be pathetic...@But hey, I'm still stronger than you.

group_1.textRight: You son of a...!
...Wh-what did you...?@I can't get any strength into my legs...

group_1.textLeft: I can't have ya trashin' the place here.
So I had to do a little fussin' around@when I adjusted you earlier.
You're not gonna be able to move your legs@properly for a bit.

group_1.textRight: Fuck you! You coward!

group_1.textLeft: "Coward" is fine by me.
Coordinators are pretty strong, huh?@Ain't that a great skill to have?
And ya know, if I took you under my wing,@you'd learn this same power.

group_1.textRight: What...?

group_1.textLeft: You should be jumpin' for the chance to become@my apprentice.

group_1.textRight: ...Absolutely not.

group_1.textLeft: How come?

group_1.textRight: I have to be happy, for my mother's sake...

group_1.textLeft: What's that got to do with refusin' my offer?

group_1.textRight: Apprenticeship means a person is robbed of@freedom and forced to obey...
...in the name of "guidance". It'd be close to the@worst thing I've ever experienced.
That's the FARTHEST thing from happiness.
What, are you shocked I said that?
I don't feel guilt. Putting on a sorry face won't@get you any sympathy from me.

group_1.textLeft: ...Your mother sure traumatized ya, didn't she...

group_1.textRight: ...Wait a minute.@Why are you bringing up my mother...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, ya see...
I took a li'l peek at your memories during that@adjustment.

group_1.textRight: *Gasp*?!
Y-you saw...my past...?!

group_1.textLeft: Uh-huh. There was somethin' I had to check.
It was a necessary step.
'Cause it seems like what ya wish for when ya@become a Magical Girl...
...is an important factor for bein' a Coordinator.

group_1.textRight: QUIT FUCKING WITH ME!!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, my bad...
I owes ya an apology for lookin' into your memories@without permission...
I dunno if this'll make up for it at all, but my wish@was also...

group_1.textRight: I don't want to hear your excuses.
I hated you from the minute we first met.
And now I know why.
You're just like my mother.

group_1.textLeft: Wha...

group_1.textRight: You claim you're doing this "for my own good",
but you stole my body's freedom and insensitively@messed with my soul.
It's all about what's most convenient for YOU,@with no regard for my own feelings...
That's what makes you the same...
I don't want to see your face ever again.

group_1.textLeft: Hang on, where are you goin'?

group_1.textRight: Home.

group_1.textLeft: With your body like that? Ya gonna get hurt.

group_1.textRight: I'd rather fall flat on my ass than be anywhere@near you.
